verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and passed through <S%G1330><s%> <S%G5711><s%> Yericho <S%G2410><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, there was a man <S%G435><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Zacchaeus <S%G2195><s%>, which <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> the chief among the publicans <S%G754><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> it, they <S%G1234><s%> all <S%G537><s%> murmured <S%G1234><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, That <S%G3754><s%> he was gone <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to be guest <S%G2647><s%> <S%G5658><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> that is a sinner <S%G268><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Zacchaeus <S%G2195><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>; Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, the half <S%G2255><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> goods <S%G5224><s%> <S%G5723><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1536><s%> I have taken <S%G4811><s%> any thing <S%G1536><s%> from any man <S%G5100><s%> by false accusation <S%G4811><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, I restore <S%G591><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him fourfold <S%G5073><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, that when <S%G1722><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was returned <S%G1880><s%> <S%G5629><s%>, having received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%>, then <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to be called <S%G5455><s%> <S%G5683><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, to whom <S%G3739><s%> he had given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the money <S%G694><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he might know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5632><s%> how much <S%G5101><s%> every man <S%G5101><s%> had gained by trading <S%G1281><s%> <S%G5662><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> <S%G5633><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, thy <S%G4675><s%> pound <S%G3414><s%> hath gained <S%G4333><s%> <S%G5662><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> pounds <S%G3414><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, he went <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5711><s%> before <S%G1715><s%>, ascending up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, when <S%G5613><s%> he was come nigh <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Beit-Pagei <S%G967><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Beit-Anyah <S%G963><s%>, at <S%G4314><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5746><s%> the mount of Olives <S%G1636><s%>, he sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5656><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>,

Saying <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, Go ye <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5720><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> over against <S%G2713><s%> you; in <S%G1722><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> at your entering <S%G1531><s%> <S%G5740><s%> ye shall find <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5692><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, whereon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> yet never <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G444><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> <S%G5656><s%> <S%G4455><s%>: loose <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5660><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and bring <S%G71><s%> <S%G5628><s%> him hither.
